title: Demi Rose sets pulses racing for sexy LA photoshoot
text:
Advertisement

She has been sending temperatures soaring this month as she continues her racy tour of California and Nevada.

And Demi Rose was at it again last week as she posed up a storm for a sexy photoshoot at Venice Beach in Los Angeles.

The model, 24, looked sensational as she showcased her jaw-dropping curves in yet another risqué ensemble at the popular holiday spot.

Wow: Demi Rose was at it again last week as she posed up a storm for a sexy photoshoot at Venice Beach in Los Angeles

Demi displayed her very ample assets in a plunging pink gingham patterned cropped shirt, which was tied into a knot to show off her tiny toned waist.

The Instagram sensation teamed the item of clothing with a pair of high-waisted denim shorts, which showcased her peachy posterior.

Adding some finishing touches, but ensuring her outfit take centre stage, Demi accessorised her look with a pair of brown suede fringed knee-high cowboy boots.

The model styled her brunette locks into a glossy curly blow-dried hairdo, adding a slick of glamorous make-up to enhance her pretty features.

Sensational: The model, 24, looked sensational as she displayed her very ample assets in a plunging pink gingham patterned cropped shirt, which was tied into a knot to show off her tiny toned waist

Work it: The Instagram sensation teamed the item of clothing with a pair of high-waisted denim shorts, which showcased her peachy posterior

Cowboy-inspired: Adding some finishing touches, but ensuring her outfit take centre stage, Demi accessorised her look with a pair of brown suede fringed knee-high cowboy boots

The snaps come after Demi stripped off once again for a cowboy inspired photoshoot in Nevada during her Las Vegas road trip earlier this month.

The model, 24, put on a very risqué display as she strolled around Redrock Canyon topless, with her cowboy hat in hand, wearing nothing but a ripped denim thong.

The Instagram sensation has garnered the attention of 10.4million followers since she propelled to fame after being romantically linked to Kylie Jenner's ex Tyga.

What a woman: The model styled her brunette locks into a glossy curly blow-dried hairdo, adding a slick of glamorous make-up to enhance her pretty features

Busy bee: The snaps come after Demi stripped off once again for a cowboy inspired photoshoot in Nevada during her Las Vegas road trip earlier this month

Love life: Since then, the swimwear icon has mainly kept her love with DJ Chris Martinez on the down-low, but confirmed their split last week

Since then, the swimwear icon has mainly kept her love with DJ Chris Martinez on the down-low, but confirmed their split last week.

Demi and the DJ have vowed to continue as friends and to support each other's careers, despite the split.

A representative for the star told MailOnline: 'Unfortunately Demi & her boyfriend Chris Martinez have parted ways. They have ended as friends and continue to support each other throughout their careers.'

They added of the beauty: 'Demi is single and very happy working on her career in the USA.'

Single: A representative for the star told MailOnline: 'Unfortunately Demi & her boyfriend Chris Martinez have parted ways. They have ended as friends and continue to support each other throughout their careers.'

Though Demi is no stranger to flaunting her figure on social media, she has kept her relationship with DJ Chris on the down-low, with the former couple having enjoyed a private romance primarily out of the limelight.

The model has also been linked to DJ Tom Zanetti in the past. In the wake of their split, Demi took to Instagram to share a snap, of which she captioned: 'Thinking of you.'

Despite her gruelling travelling schedule, the model insisted to MailOnline she sticks to her 'healthy' routine and she admitted nuts are the fattiest foods she eats.

Cryptic: The model has also been linked to DJ Tom Zanetti in the past. In the wake of their split, Demi took to Instagram to share a snap, of which she captioned: 'Thinking of you.'

In September last year, Demi revealed: 'I try to keep as healthy as I can. With travelling, it's hard to work out, I travel across the world but try to keep my routine...

'Everyone says I'm the healthiest person they know. The fattiest thing I will ever eat is nuts and peanut butter.

'My figure just gains weight so fast. Any bad thing I eat my body isn't used to it and just puts on the weight. That means no birthday cake.

'All I've eaten today is nuts. I've managed to eat a whole pot. I feel guilty as there's a lot of fat in the nuts. That's my treat. So I'm happy.'
description: The model, 24, looked sensational as she showcased her jaw-dropping curves in yet another risqué ensemble at the popular holiday spot.
